Reviews.Title: best camera ever
Reviews.Author: Dj
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera years ago. Put it away for 5 years and forgot about it switched to digital. Found it again. Was so excited just thinking about the great pictures I had that I decided to dump my expensive digital and go back to the old school. Haven't regretted it since. I take alot of action shots. Cheer, jet sking etc. A pictures I have from years ago w/this camera is my husband doing a submarine on a stand up jet ski. They dive under front end first and completely submerge the ski I could never catch the full sequence w/dig let alone 1 good shot. Catch all steps now first time out w/it. GREATEST CAMERA EVER

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: The product I ordered was returned to the company damaged so they emailed me and sent me another one out and credited my account so the product was free. The only thing was it was a different camera then the one I had ordered. The reason I had ordered the first camera was because it came with a neck strap which I needed because this was to be used as a prop in a dance so I was a little disappointed when I didn't get what I ordered. We had to make our own strap. I did appreciate the company for there  service.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full-Automatic 35 mm autofocus lens-shutter camera with built in
38-105 mm Zoom lens.  35mm standard DX coded film (24 x 36 mm)
Passive autofocus system with focus lock.  Focusing range
0.8 m (2.6 Ft) Infinity at 38 mm.  Automatic Film Winding
Weight 21.5 oz, Automatic Loading.  Selftimer
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus Infinity Super Zoom 330 Camera
